snippet.title: 【Kiichan】學貓叫 / Learn to Meow (CHN/KOR/JPN/ENG) 歌ってみた
snippet.description:
"You say you love me, I say meow meow meow~"
_____________________________________________

Happy Lunar New Year!!

im not a cat

This cover has been done since..I think around June 2019? LOL
It's another of those poor songs that I finished for a long time but never uploaded cuz I was too lazy to make the video...
Anyway it's finally out now! My pride & joy, the signature song I always sing when prompted in VRChat HAHA
I first got inspired to sing it after seeing the Raon Lee cover of it, and I recorded & finished that same day. I decided to make it multilingual after finding out there were different language versions that existed, so I mixed em all up & arranged them the way you hear it now!

Originally I was finally prompted to make the video for this as an entry to the Hololive EN VSinger auditions, but sadly I didn't make it cuz I was too indecisive haha
So I'm making it for Lunar New Year instead...which I also didn't make it in time to, damn HAHjgkfdnhkf
well whatever, it's out now & that's what matters right? ;; orz

The art was a whole ass pain to draw haha I haven't drawn seriously in a long time prior to this so I was like..oh no..
I even had to redo the EN one cuz the first version I drew was just..bleh.
I just randomly decided to make them (me??) wear modern-ish? versions of China/Korea/Japan's traditional outfits cuz why not
Only the JP version was accurate enough in the 3D version tho, cuz I was too lazy to redraw the art to match the models & not knowledgable enough to edit the models to match the art lmao
So there was a whole ass modeling(?) process too in addition to drawing, and then there was recording the dancing too--but I think that part was kinda fun o3o
I choreographed bits & pieces of each dance even tho I know nothing about dancing or choreography AHHAHA
i think at least the end results look nice, i guess

The animation was a whole other beast to tackle T_T
I think I could've done better but again I was on a deadline so this would have to do,,,anyway it's not too bad either, I guess I'm just not too happy with the typography;;

Sooo there you have ittt,,the first cover among many to soon follow for this month!
I hope y'all like this & watch out for the other ones in the next coming days/weeks !!

_____ c r e d i t s _____
★ Song : 學貓叫 (Say Meow Meow, 고양이 소리를 따라해보자, 猫の声を真似してみよう) by 小潘潘 & 小峰峰
★ Vocals • Mix • Art • Video : Kiichan (me)
